description: see http://hl7.org/fhir/json.html#schema for information about the FHIR Json Schemas

allOf.description: Record of delivery of what is supplied.

identifier.description: Identifier assigned by the dispensing facility when the item(s) is dispensed.

status.description: A code specifying the state of the dispense event.

patient.description: A link to a resource representing the person whom the delivered item is for.

type.description: Indicates the type of dispensing event that is performed. Examples include: Trial Fill, Completion of Trial, Partial Fill, Emergency Fill, Samples, etc.

quantity.description: The amount of supply that has been dispensed. Includes unit of measure.

suppliedItemCodeableConcept.description: Identifies the medication, substance or device being dispensed. This is either a link to a resource representing the details of the item or a code that identifies the item from a known list.

suppliedItemReference.description: Identifies the medication, substance or device being dispensed. This is either a link to a resource representing the details of the item or a code that identifies the item from a known list.

supplier.description: The individual responsible for dispensing the medication, supplier or device.

whenPrepared.description: The time the dispense event occurred.

time.description: The time the dispensed item was sent or handed to the patient (or agent).

destination.description: Identification of the facility/location where the Supply was shipped to, as part of the dispense event.

receiver.description: Identifies the person who picked up the Supply.
